body{ background:skyblue; } .main_wrapper{ width:1000px; height:auto; margin:auto; } .header_wrapper{ width:1000px; height:100px; margin:auto; } #logo{ } .menubar{ width:1000px; height:50px; background:gray; color:white; } #menu{ padding:0; margin:0; line-height:35px; } #menu li{ list-style:none; display:inline; } #menu a{ text-decoration:none; color:white; padding:8px; margin:5px; font-size:20px; font-family:comic sans ms; } #menu a:hover{ color:orange; font-weight:bolder; text-decoration:underline; } #form{ float:right; padding-right:8px; line-height:px; } .content_wrapper{ width:1000px; height:800px; margin:auto; background: #ff9966; } #content_area{ width:800px; height:800px; margin:auto; float:right; background:#ff9966; } #sidebar{ width:200px; height:800px; margin:auto; float:left; background: #0066cc; } #sidebar_title{ background:white; color:black; font-size:22px; font-family:arial; text-align:center; } #cats li{ list-style:none; display:block; margin:5px; } #cats a{ color:white; padding:8px; margin:10px; text-align:center; font-size:20px; font-family:comic sans ms; text-decoration:none; } #cats a:hover{ color:orange; font-weight:bolder; text-decoration:underline; } #footer{ width:1000px; height:100px; background:gray; }
